name: Terminal (Jim Hall)
description:
Terminal.

A small 1 bit horror game with references to some of my favorite films and video games. 

Tools Used:
https://aloelazoe.itch.io/bitsy-3d
https://candle.itch.io/bitsy-audio

The background music is a track I wrote called Darkness. Originally released as Three Chain Links. You can find the track here:

https://threechainlinks.bandcamp.com/track/darkness
